patthana16.54:1.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.54:1.1_1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.54:1.1_2: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.54:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.54:2.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana16.54:2.1_2: anidassanaappaṭighaṁ appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho naappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
